decks.notes: This deck focuses on generating mana quickly with cards like Pyretic Ritual and Ruby Medallion, eventually setting up to combo off with cards like Glimpse the Impossible and Ral, Monsoon Mage to deal a massive amount of damage to the opponent. It also includes cards like Past in Flames and Wish to provide additional combos and flexibility. The deck aims to be fast and explosive, utilizing red mana sources and cheap spells to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to set up their own game plan.

The deck revolves around utilizing Underworld Breach to loop powerful spells and artifacts from the graveyard, generating infinite mana with Mox Amber and Grinding Station to win the game with Thassa's Oracle or by burning opponents out with spells like Unholy Heat and Lightning Bolt. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide card advantage and graveyard recursion, while Urza's Saga helps tutor for key pieces. The deck aims to assemble its combo pieces quickly and efficiently to overwhelm opponents and secure a quick victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Amulet of Vigor and Arboreal Grazer, while utilizing lands like Simic Growth Chamber and Crumbling Vestige. The key strategy is to efficiently cast Primeval Titan to search for key lands like Vesuva and Urza's Saga, while using cards like Scapeshift to quickly assemble combos. The deck also includes hand disruption with cards like Boseiju, Who Endures and additional win conditions like Cultivator Colossus. The overall goal is to outpace and overwhelm opponents with powerful land combos and big threats.

The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan by using a combination of countermagic, targeted removal, hand disruption, and powerful threats like Murktide Regent and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares. It also utilizes card advantage engines like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Subtlety to outvalue the opponent. The mana base is designed to support the control game plan with a mix of fetch lands and dual lands. The overall strategy is to control the game and eventually win with a powerful threat while keeping the opponent on the back foot.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures like Territorial Kavu and Scion of Draco to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It also utilizes powerful spells like Tribal Flames and Lightning Bolt to control the board and finish off opponents. The Leyline enchantments and Leyline Binding help to protect your creatures and disrupt your opponent's game plan. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with early aggression and efficient removal spells, while utilizing lands like Wooded Foothills and Flooded Strand for ramp and fixing.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly using cards like Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. Control elements are present with Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Karn, the Great Creator is included for additional utility and versatility. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with large creatures and powerful spells while maintaining control of the game through efficient removal and disruption.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the Splinter Twin combo with Deceiver Exarch to create infinite hasty tokens. This combo allows for a quick win condition by overwhelming the opponent with a large army of tokens. The deck also includes control elements such as Counterspells and removal spells to protect the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base includes fetchlands and dual lands to ensure consistent and smooth mana production. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Lightning Bolt provides additional removal and reach to finish off opponents.

The deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to deal damage quickly to the opponent. It also includes cards like Goblin Bombardment and Galvanic Discharge to control the board and remove threats. The inclusion of Ranger-Captain of Eos helps in tutoring for key creatures, while Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provides additional support and boosts to the team. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and efficient aggro strategy, supported by a mix of creatures, removal spells, and utility cards.

This Boros Aggro deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a mix of aggressive creatures and burn spells. Key cards like Guide of Souls, Ajani, Nacatl Pariah, and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer help to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure. The deck also utilizes cards like Goblin Bombardment and Static Prison to disrupt opponent strategies and control the battlefield. By combining efficient creatures and direct damage spells, this deck aims to finish off opponents quickly before they have a chance to stabilize.

This aggressive Modern deck focuses on quickly reducing your own life total to take advantage of the powerful Death's Shadow creature. Utilizing a combination of disruption and efficient threats, the deck can quickly put pressure on opponents while also maintaining control of the game with cards like Counterspell and Thoughtseize. By carefully managing your life total and resources, you can overwhelm your opponent and secure a victory before they have a chance to stabilize.
